alert.note: Alert for La Salle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 2:56PM CDT until March 26 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern La Salle County in north central Illinois... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 254 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ladd, or near Peru, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 232 PM, quarter size hail was reported in Bureau, IL. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Peru, La Salle, Earlville, Troy Grove, Prairie Center and Triumph. Including the following interstates... I-39 between mile markers 58 and 71. I-80 between mile markers 74 and 82. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
